definition: to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由羅家文進行實驗探究並將成果彙總並製成研究報告。

sentences.english: Chapter three explores how to lead the primary school language teaching into the local culture of study in primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探究了小學語文教學引入如東地方文化的實踐。

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 開發具自律學習輔助機制之網路探究學習系統。

sentences.english: What is more, the author also tries to construct the senior chemistry teaching model of developing autonomous learning.
sentences.chinese: 作者還嘗試構建了高中化學自主探究教學模式。

sentences.english: We will explore this concept in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 我們在接下來的部分探究這個概念。

sentences.english: Chapter two is the exploration on nomological basis of underground space exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲地下空間開發利用法理基礎探究。

sentences.english: This article explores how these things came to be.
sentences.chinese: 本文探究這些事物的形成原由。

sentences.english: Probe into advertising language are of important and special function.
sentences.chinese: 探究省略句在廣告中所發揮的重要而特殊的作用。

sentences.english: Haynes wasn't the first neuroscientist to explore unconscious decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 海恩斯並非第一個探究無意識思考決策的神經學家。

sentences.english: It is very complicated to probe the reason why the western noted universities can keep vigorous.
sentences.chinese: 探究西方名校“活力”之源，是一個非常複雜的問題。

sentences.english: Understanding Zhouese cultural concept is the important premise of deep research on ShiJing .
sentences.chinese: 清理周人的文化觀念是深入探究《詩經》的重要前提。

sentences.english: Self-monitoring action was a vitally important link in mathematical inquiry learning.
sentences.chinese: 自我監控活動是數學探究過程中的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: Inquiry , indeed , is a work which devolves upon experts.
sentences.chinese: 探究確實是移交給專家的一項工作。

sentences.english: This article explores on the relation between Rumi and Grotowski.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章嘗試探究魯米和格洛托夫斯基之間的關係。

sentences.english: Inquirers We nurture our curiosity, developing skills for inquiry and research.
sentences.chinese: 探究者我們培養髮展自己天生的好奇心。
